catalog.description: Study the elements and principles of design through the use of form, visual principles, theoretical and visual experimentation, concept development, and creative thinking. Systems, symbols, icons and expressive typography will be used to visually represent ideas and messages.
catalog.prerequisite: DESGD 145. Accepted graphic design pre-majors, Advertising Design minors, or instructor permission.
catalog.title: Design 2.

course_headers.header_text: DESGD 245 is available to majors only, until August 31<sup>st</sup>. On August 31<sup>st</sup> the course will open to minors. The course will open for Advertising Design minors on June 30<sup>th</sup>.
